snippet: Though there was improvement, economic data also underlined the view that the pace of future growth is likely to remain well below that seen in recent years.
abstract: Data indicates that China's gross domestic product expanded by 7.9 percent during the final quarter of 2012, but figures support view that future growth will likely remain slower than in recent years.
lead_paragraph: Though there was improvement, economic data also underlined the view that the pace of future growth is likely to remain well below that seen in recent years.

headline.main: Chinese Economy Expanded at End of 2012, Data Shows
headline.print_headline:
Chinese Economy Expanded
At End of 2012, Data Shows
